.. py:class:: RadialAngDist(sparam=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`nexoclom2.initial_state.InputClass.InputClass`


   
   Angular distribution with all particles ejected radially from the surface

   * altitude set to 90ยบ
   * azimuth set to 0ยบ
